Description:
ABANA Enterprises Group Co. is a leading player in the banking industry with a strong commitment to providing quality service to its clientele. We are seeking a Field Service Technician to be responsible for providing first-class service to our clients through the installation, repair, maintenance, and upgrading of our banking systems and equipment. The ideal candidate should have strong technical skills and experience working in a customer-facing role. As a Field Service Technician, you will play a critical role in ensuring a seamless banking experience for our customers.Ensure to diagnose machine problem as per endorsed SJO and repair the machine.
Proper troubleshooting knowledge and accuracy in parts replacement ensuring to solve repair trouble machines.
Able to understand and apply technical skill repairs and both hardware and software.Constantly monitors inventory levels.Prepares MRF for branch stock & Field Engineer car kit.Monitor & manage of defective spare parts.Job Details
